name: BatchUpdateTableRowsHubspot
description:
Update multiple draft table rows in HubSpot CMS.

This tool updates up to 100 rows in the draft version of a specified HubSpot CMS table. Use it when you need to apply changes to several rows at once in a draft table.

parameters.name: table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table to update rows in the draft version.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

parameters.name: row_updates
parameters.description: JSON array containing data for each row update, including 'id', 'path', 'childTableId', 'values', 'name', and 'displayIndex'.

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

id.description: The id of the table row

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

id.description: The id of the table row

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
